:art: style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
:hammer: refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
:rocket: perf: A code change that improves performance
:white_check_mark: test: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
:building_construction: build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies
:construction_worker: ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts
:wrench: chore: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
